slides.tagline: Premium Compact with True to Life Display
slides.body: Following on the success of the LG G3, the LG G3 S is a welcome addition. With a 5.0" true to life HD IPS display and an advanced 8MP camera with Laser Auto Focus, LG G3 S combines best-in-class technology all within a sleek, compact, metallic design. Plus, powered by a long lasting 2540mAh removable battery, you can stay connected all day long.

With Android Wear™ at its core, the LG G Watch R is the next generation to join the LG wearable's range. Sporting a stunning full circle Plastic OLED display, the LG G Watch R perfectly combines classic watch design with an advanced, easy to use, user interface. Delivering essential information, anytime, anywhere.
Experience seamless, unwavering 4G LTE connectivity on this affordable smartphoneâ€”download, browse, and stream at lightning-fast speeds.

slides.tagline: The Finest Visibility, Quad HD Display
slides.body: The LG G3 'super phone' features an astounding 5.5" Quad HD IPS screen built within a stylish, metallic design that's both lightweight and comfortable to hold. Plus with a powerful, long lasting 3,000mAh removable battery, a super-fast 2.46 Quad-Core Qualcomm Snapdragon 801™ processor and a simplified yet intelligent user interface, the LG G3 is quite simply stunning.

The LG G2 mini is a welcome addition to the LG range, boasting the good looks of the stunning G2, with near zero bezel and the innovative Rear Key. It's compact but still with an impressive 4.7 inch qHD display and features such as Knock Code™, Guest Mode™ and Quick Memo. In addition there is a Micro SD card slot and removable battery.

Discover the LG G Flex, the shape of innovation. With a sleek and stunning vertical curved design providing a 6 inch cinematic display. The flexible handset also boasts a 'self-healing' coating on the back cover, which gives it the ability to recover from light scratches and nicks. Performance will be impressive with Qualcomm© Snapdragon™ 800 2.2GHz QuadCore processor, and a high capacity 3,500 mAh Li-Polymer curved battery. Shape your experience with the LG G Flex.

The LG G2 is a true powerhouse smartphone that delivers greater speed in a sophisticated, slim line design. With a unique rear key button that allows you to control the phone in its most intuitive way, plus a near zero bezel and full HD IPS display, the G2 demonstrates premium design sophistication at its very best.
